sn38.2:4.5: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38.2:4.6: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38.2:4.7: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38.2:4.8: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.2:4.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo, ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38.2:4.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāya.
